name: Buddy
description: Buddy is a friendly, energetic Golden Retriever who loves outdoor activities. He enjoys playing fetch and gets along well with children and other dogs. Heâ€™s looking for an active family to adopt him.

name: Max
description: Max is a calm and affectionate Bulldog. He enjoys lounging around and is very easy-going. Max would thrive in a quiet home and with an owner who is looking for a laid-back companion.

name: Bella
description: Bella is an affectionate Labrador who loves to fetch and swim. She enjoys spending time with her family and would be a great companion for an active family. She has already been adopted by a loving home.

name: Sadie
description: Sadie is an energetic Beagle with a playful personality. She loves exploring the outdoors and would be an excellent choice for a family with an active lifestyle. Sadie is ready to be adopted!

name: Rocky
description: Rocky is a loyal and intelligent German Shepherd. He enjoys training and outdoor activities. He needs an experienced owner who can provide the structure and exercise he craves.

name: Lucy
description: Lucy is a sweet and intelligent Poodle with a friendly disposition. She enjoys playing with toys, getting attention, and taking walks. Lucy would do well in a family home and gets along with children and other pets.
